roleset.name: (ship or boat) to tip over or roll over upside down, usually in water
roleset.note: CAPSIZE-V NOTES: Frame file created by Miriam. (from capsize.01-v)

example.name: agentive
example.text: A 19-year-old man lost his life when he capsized his 10-foot kayak.

example.name: ergative
example.text: A fishing boat crowded with more than 100 African migrants capsized at least twice while sailing to Spain's Canary Islands.
example.arg: A fishing boat crowded with more than 100 African migrants
while sailing to Spain's Canary Islands
